lines.text: He's never loved another woman, has he, mother? No one else. But I, but I have so *many* lovers, so many lovers, so many, so many! See how many lovers, mother! See how many, how many, how many . . .

[concerning Antonina]
She'll ruin you! She'll ruin you . . .
How cruel. How can you say that? Don't I live? Everyone thinks they can do as they like with me! Even you!
My husband's a most famous man. I'm Madame Tchaikovsky from Moscow. My husband, he really did love me! Oh, Peter, my love...
He hated me. He hated me!
I musn't panic. I musn't panic. I musn't...
